Articles.Content: Hello, I downloaded KSP a few days ago and it is a fantastic game and simulator. I guess what really renewed my interest in space exploration was the launch of the Orion a few weeks ago.

Ah, well welcome to our community! I'm sure you'll love it here.

Also, if you're new to space genre of stuff then you're in for a treat. I saw myself as space fanatic when I first started KSP, and if I was a fanatic back then I must now be an absolute mental patient. KSP really shows how awesome spaceflight is!
Hello great to see another person loving ksp

Thanks for the welcome.

Thomas I like the ribbons in your signature.
